New Records: Jonatan Clase hit his first career home run
Key Match Events: Kevin Gausman pitched six innings to match his career high in wins
Jonatan Clase extended Toronto's lead with a homer off Josh Winckowski in the seventh inning
Alejandro Kirk had three hits and three RBIs as the Blue Jays won for the first time in six games
Pre-Game Insights: The Red Sox, who had won four in a row coming into the game, needed to win their final four games and get help from opponents in the American League wild-card race
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora said 'At one point it felt like we were a playoff caliber team and then we missed the opportunity.'
Outfielder Jarren Duran said 'Iâ€™m proud of what this clubhouse was able to do and what we accomplished.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Jays finished 21-31 against AL East opponents for the second straight year
The Red Sox finished their road schedule at 43-38.
The Blue Jays recalled RHP Brett de Geus from Triple-A Buffalo and optioned RHP Tommy Nance to the spring training facility.
